author: mteroerd
body:
This is for now hopefully the last of a batch of APE tool improvements.

Further improved the way to define input file names and input sample names for measurements and skims. 

Added easy way to do prefer statements in the config.ini file for a measurement so that they do not have to be defined in apeEstimator_cfg.py. The prefer statements are defined in a file that is created in python/conditions/ which is then loaded into apeEstimator_cfg.py
title: Further usability improvements for APE tool
